p: This deficiency of insulin led to decreased amino acids uptake by tissues with a consequent reduction in the level of protein synthesis and also results in lipolysis in adipose tissues and protein breakdown (Mohan et al., 2013). 28 Similar observations were detected in many experimental studies. 29, 30 In this study, daily oral treatment with extract showed significant increase (p<0.05) in body weight at the end of the experiment when compared with diabetic control. This result matched with the results reported by Toma et al, Geleta et al, Ghebreselassie et al, Musa et al, 2015. 15, 17, 27, 31
